pull.title: [TESTBED][NO-MERGE][POC] Use std::filesystem. Remove Boost Filesystem & System
pull.body:
This PR is meant only to test some small modifications of #20744 to fix tests.


Android test failure: 

* https://github.com/android/ndk/wiki/Changelog-r22#changes - required NDK is 22, master has 21.

build: set OSX_MIN_VERSION to 10.15

This is required to use std::filesystem on macOS.

events.message:
build: set OSX_MIN_VERSION to 10.15

This is required to use std::filesystem on macOS.

verification.payload:
tree 10d2bdc4c5cdc7f798dbde61278fb71ad39f3557
parent 97e537766f0ecdc083e9535c4dd43c938279c8ed
author Kiminuo <kiminuo@protonmail.com> 1591858726 +0200
committer fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1624531355 +0800

refactor: replace boost::filesystem with std::filesystem

Warning: Replacing fs::system_complete calls with fs::absolute calls
in this commit may cuase minor changes in behaviour because fs::absolute
no longer strips trailing slashes; however these changes are believed to
be safe.

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #22339 by hebasto
* #21851 by fanquake
* #21652 by MarcoFalke
* #20586 by hebasto
* #20487 by practicalswift
* #17127 by hebasto
* #10102 by ryanofsky

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
As far as I'm aware, the relevant changes here have been integrated back into #22336. So I'm going to close this for now.

@fanquake The difference between this PR and your PR is in commit https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/17eff90922f005e88cba33fba1d14225e0474f93 and consequently in checks:

* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22336/checks
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20744/checks

I'm not sure whether your response means that you don't like the https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/17eff90922f005e88cba33fba1d14225e0474f93 commit. Anyway, you did not explicitly reject it in this PR or in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20744#issuecomment-867883071. It would be helpful for me to know whether you like it or not.

> The difference between this PR and your PR is in commit 17eff90 

Apologies, I have the changes from https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/17eff90922f005e88cba33fba1d14225e0474f93 integrated locally, but forgot to push the branch up. In future, if you want to suggest changes, just commenting is fine, there's not really a need to open these kinds of PRs. I'll rebase #20744 on top of the Android fixes for `std::filesystem` and push the changes up shortly.
